import React, { useState, useCallback } from 'react'; import { useConversations } from '../context/ConversationsProvider'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthProvider'; export default function OpenConversation() { const [text, setText] = useState(''); const { sendMessage, selectedConversationIdx, conversations } = useConversations(); const { auth } = useAuth(); const selectedConversation = conversations[selectedConversationIdx]; let fromMe const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); sendMessage( conversations[selectedConversationIdx].recipients, text ); } return (

Scarlett Johansson

Active 1h ago

{selectedConversation?.message.map()}
{conversations[selectedConversationIdx]?.messages.map((message, idx) => { return (
{message.text}
{message.sender === auth.username ? 'You' : message.sender}
) })}
